about_the_game:
Step into a violent world of underground boxing. In this turn-based simulation (optional auto-battle), you'll recruit, train, and manage a roster of boxing champions as you strive to build the ultimate fighting dynasty.

Create Your Gym:

Assemble a diverse team of boxers with unique skills and styles. Each boxer contributes to earning cash for the gym. Use cash to train your boxers.

Recruit or Create Boxers:

Scour the globe for the most talented fighters to join your gym. From seasoned veterans to up-and-coming prospects, every boxer has unique strengths, weaknesses, and personalities. Negotiate contracts, manage synergies, and build relationships with your fighters to unlock their full potential.

Dozens of Perks / Endless Boxer Builds:

Perks are special abilities or bonuses that enhance a boxer's performance in different aspects of the game. These can range from increased stamina and power to improved defensive maneuvers or tactical advantages in the ring. As the manager, you'll need to carefully choose which perks to invest in, ensuring they synergize with each boxer's strengths, weaknesses, fighting style, and the gyms overall goals.

Increasing Stats by Training:

In addition to choosing perks, you can also allocate cash to increase your boxers' base stats. Each stat contributes to a boxer's overall performance in the ring and can be improved through targeted training and development programs.

Perma-Death Mechanics:

In "Turn Based Boxing" each boxer's health and well-being are crucial. When a boxer sustains severe injuries during matches, there's a chance they could suffer permanent consequences, including death. This adds a high-stakes element to every decision you make.

Complete Quests and Unlock Strategies:

Meet quest criteria to unlock strategies that any boxer in your gym can utilize. Strategies can be changed before each round of fighting.

Climb the Ranking and become a Boxing Legend:

With perseverance, strategy, and a little bit of luck, you'll lead your gym to greatness and cement your legacy as one of the greatest boxing managers of all time. Will you build a dynasty that stands the test of time, or will your dreams of glory be knocked out cold?

Fight in Epic Boxing Battles:

"Turn Based Boxing" offers a deep and immersive experience for fans of both boxing and management simulations. Are you ready to step into the ring and become a champion?

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

This game contains pixel-art depictions of mild blood and violence related to boxing matches. In rare instances, a boxer may suffer a fatal injury in the ring, adding a dramatic but stylized element to the game. These depictions are not graphic in nature due to the pixel art style but may still be unsettling to some players. There are no depictions of sexual content, drug use, or non-consensual violence. However, players sensitive to themes of injury or death may want to proceed with caution.

short_description: A boxing simulation. Recruit fighters, train them, assign perks, and send them into the ring. Complete quest objectives to unlock coaching strategies. Manage finances and injuries to avoid sending your fighters to an early grave.
